div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:22 am CDT

div.div: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 74. Breezy, with a southwest wind 11 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly between 9pm and 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. South southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:22 am CDT

div.div: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 74. Breezy, with a southwest wind 11 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly between 9pm and 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. South southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.
